name: Blob-Blob Game
description:
From the cold dark depths of a cave, the gelatinous slime on the walls begins to morph and congeal into two living blobs! Now they must squish and mesh their way through the cave to see the world. But challenging cave layouts and obstacles stand in their way. The cooperation of the two blobs will be thoroughly tested!

With 49 levels, Blob-Blob Game is a short puzzle game that forces you to think outside the box to help our squishy little friends. 

Controls: 

  ASWD or Arrow keys - Move the selected blob

  Shift - Switch to control the other blob / Split up if currently controlling a combined blob

  R - hold to restart stage

  Esc - Pause the game

This small fun game is a cooperation between us four awesome students from Rochester Institute of Technology! It started out as a class project but grew into a game we worked on throughout the summer to bring it to a state we are proud of. The team is: 

James Feng - Level Designer

Nik Barbero - Sound Designer and co-programmer 

Alex Sarnese - Programmer  

Benjamin Lincourt - Artist

We hope you enjoy our game!
